name: Dubtrack Retro 80s Style - Neon Chrome VHS
description: A custom CSS theme for dubtrack built on the shoulders of giants (Maskinen, DemoZ, Frosolf, Netux) inspired by the sweet retro stylings of the 80s / VHS / neon / chrome. Requires DubX (https://dubx.net/).
additional_info: This version will not be updated as often as that available on my GitHub, located here: https://ajmrly.github.io/stylesheets/lettucetrackretro.css
